about_the_game:
Contents
This content adds one (1) Palico Edit Voucher to Monster Hunter Wilds.

Palico Edit Vouchers let you redo your Palico creation and debut a new look!

Select a voucher from the Save Data Selection Screen to change the appearance of an existing Palico.

*This add-on content can only be obtained once.
*Can be used to edit your Palico once (one edit will consume this voucher).
*You may need to update to the latest version of the game to use this content.
